product_name: Exped DownMat Lite 5 Air Pad with MiniPump
long_description: The down-insulated Exped DownMat Lite 5 air pad with MiniPump is lightweight and compact, and it provides excellent comfort all year round. 650-fill-power duck down inside the pad provides an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for a restful night's sleep on cold evenings. Welded, low-profile valve allows quick inflation and deflation. Inflate the pad in just 2 min. with the included Exped MiniPump; using the pump rather than your mouth to inflate the pad helps keep the down dry. Perimeter baffles are raised slightly to keep you from sliding off the Exped DownMat Lite 5 air pad.
short_description: The down-insulated Exped DownMat Lite 5 air pad with MiniPump is lightweight and compact, and it provides excellent comfort all year round.
